subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: Designers of the Sochi luge track created three uphill sections, resulting in a roller-coaster-like track that is slower than the one used for the 2010 Games at Vancouver, where a Georgian luger died.
snippet: Designers of the Sochi luge track created three uphill sections, resulting in a roller-coaster-like track that is slower than the one used for the 2010 Games at Vancouver, where a Georgian luger died.
